Package fr.lirmm.chocominer.app.declarative.constraints

package fr.lirmm.chocominer.app.declarative.constraints
Package containing declarative data mining constraints for chocomining.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.lirmm.chocominer.app.declarative.constraints.arm
    Package containing Association Rule Mining specific constraints.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractConstraint
    AbstractConstraint is the class defining the methods and arguments that every tangible constraint classes will inherit or will have to redefine.
    AbstractConstraint.RuleItemSet
    This class will be used by AbstractConstraint and will help define on which part of the rule the constraint will be applied whilst doing Association Rule Mining.
    ClosedConstraint
    A ClosedConstraint is a constraint given by the ConstraintFactory in the chocosolver module.
    ClosedDCConstraint
    A ClosedDCConstraint is a constraint given by the ConstraintFactory in the chocosolver module.
    ClosedWCConstraint
    A ClosedWCConstraint is a constraint given by the ConstraintFactory in the chocosolver module.
    ConstraintInterface
    An interface for defining the contract every declarative constraint have to fulfill.
    ForbiddenConstraint
    Given a database, an array of Boolean variables representing the itemset x, it mandates that x cannot contain any of the items/itemsets in ForbiddenConstraint.itemset.
    FrequentConstraint
    A FrequentConstraint is a constraint given by the ConstraintFactory in the chocosolver module.
    FrequentSubsConstraint
    A FrequentSubsConstraint is a constraint given by the ConstraintFactory in the chocosolver module.
    GeneratorConstraint
    A GeneratorConstraint is a constraint given by the ConstraintFactory in the chocosolver module.
    InfrequentConstraint
    Given a transactional database, a double theta and an array of Boolean variables representing the itemset x, it ensures that x is infrequent.
    InfrequentSupersConstraint
    A InfrequentSupersConstraint is a constraint given by the ConstraintFactory in the chocosolver module.
    MandatoryConstraint
    Given a database, an array of Boolean variables representing the itemset x, it mandates that x has to contain every item/itemset in MandatoryConstraint.itemset.
    SizeConstraint
    A SizeConstraint is a constraint that uses operators on the chocosolver Model.
